data.title: Playlist for Sunday, June 30th
data.meta_description: The Folk, Roots, and World Music Show, Sundays 5-7PM Eastern Time on 89.7 FM WTMD, Towson/Baltimore, MD and on wtmd.org
data.text:
Detour Playlist

Paul Hartman

June 30, 2024 5:00PM – 7:00PM

Time, artist, song, album, label, notes

5:00PM The Stone Hill All-Stars “Gray Green Harvey Jackson” Gray Green [www.facebook.com/stonehillallstars/]

5:00PM Charlie Parr “Ten Watt” Little Sun [Folkways.si.edu]

5:00PM Jerry Jeff Walker “Detour” Navajo Rug [Rykodisc] Opening theme

5:00PM Becky Buller “Jubilee” Jubilee [DarkShadowRecording.com]

5:00PM Duo Emilia Lajunen & Suvi Oskala “Rahapolska Kannonkoskelta” Toisjalkainen [Nordic-Notes.de] Finland

5:00PM Sam Nitzberg “You’re The One” Sam plays well with others [samn.bandcamp.com]

5:00PM The Sherpas “A Ways to Go” Promise to Harry [tomkimmel.com/the-sherpas] Tom Prasada-Rao passed away last week

5:00PM The Sherpas “All in the Mystery” Promise to Harry [tomkimmel.com/the-sherpas] Tom Prasada-Rao passed away last week

5:00PM Kalos “The Watchmaker” Headland [KalosBand.com]

5:00PM Fairport Convention “Love on a Farmboy’s Wages” Sense of Occasion [FairportConvention.com] England

5:00PM Billy Strings & Molly Tuttle “Listen to the Radio” More Than a Whisper: Celebrating the Music of Nanci Griffith [Rounder.com] Various artists CD

5:00PM Christian Parker “Chimes of Freedom” Change is Now – A Tribute to the Byrds [ChristianParker.com]

5:00PM Ana Egge “Don’t You Sleep” Sharing in the Spirit [StorySoundRecords.com]

5:00PM Fanfare Ciocărlia feat. Esma Redžepova “Ibrahim” Queens and Kings [Asphalt-Tango.de] Romania

6:00PM Silly Wizard “Jigs (Mac’s Fancy/The Cliffs of Moher)/Reels (The Rose of Red Hill/Clootie Dumplings/The Laird O’ Drumblair/Sleepy Maggie)” Golden, Golden [Green Linnet] Scotland

6:00PM Cris Jacobs “Everybody’s Lost” One of These Days [CrisJacobs.com]

6:00PM Monoswezi “Ndinewe” The Rough Guide to Acoustic Africa [WorldMusic.net] Mozambique/Norway/Sweden/Zimbabwe; Various artists CD

6:00PM Sierra Ferrell “Money Train” Trail of Flowers [Rounder.com]

6:00PM Mario Salvi “Tarantella di Montemarano” Planet Squeezebox [elipsis arts…] Italy; Various artists CD

6:00PM Richard Shindell “The Next Best Western” Reunion Hill [Shanachie]

6:00PM Maddy Prior & the Carnival Band “The Prodigal’s Resolution” Hang Up Sorrow & Care [Park Records] England

6:00PM Dobet Gnahoré “Dobet” Zouzou [Cumbancha.com] Ivory Coast

6:00PM Laurie Lewis “Long Gone” Trees [LaurieLewis.com]

6:00PM Lakou Mizik w/Trombone Shorty “Pistache Griye” HaitiaNola [Cumbancha.com] Haiti

6:00PM The Weight Band “Remedy” World Gone Mad [TheWeightBand.com]

6:00PM Mokoomba “Kulindiswe (remix)” Tusona: Tracings in the Sand [outhererecords.bandcamp.com] Zimbabwe

6:00PM Mads Hansens Kapel “Mads Hansens Stykke” Fanø i Flammer [GOfolk.dk] Denmark; Closing theme
